items.name: Baby wearing coat
items.shortDescription: So I can stay warm and dry (ish) whilst James is on my back
items.longDescription: I've already purchased it for Â£85 so contributions are welcome

items.name: Money towards massages
items.shortDescription: To help with post-pregnancy and baby-carrying muscle tension
items.longDescription: Carrying and caring for a growing baby puts a lot of strain on shoulders, back, and arms. Regular massages help manage this physical stress and provide some much needed relaxation time. Contributions towards professional massage sessions would be greatly appreciated.

items.name: House plant pots
items.shortDescription: So I can put plants I already have, in pots in the house
items.longDescription: I already have some pleasing plants, and one things preventing me from displaying them in my home is lack of plant pots. Perhaps you can help?

items.name: Time with helpers for sorting/organizing
items.shortDescription: To help sort out things around the house
items.longDescription: I'd benefit from helpful people to work with me on doing things round the house one day when James is at nursery and I'm off work.

items.name: 9-inch silicone square baking tray
items.longDescription: To replace worn out brownie pan - silicone preferred for easy release

items.name: Non-stick roasting tins
items.longDescription: Looking for good quality, non-stick roasting tins to replace tired ones. Various sizes welcome.
